key.name: debug-nodes
key.description: If this setting is true, the recorder will insert debug nodes into the recording.

key.name: record-events
key.description: If this setting is true, the recorder will include events in the recording.

key.name: highlight-sequences
key.description: If this setting is true, the recorder will highlight events that are part of an event sequence.

key.name: dark
key.description: If this setting is true, the recorder will display render nodes on a dark background.
